scripts.build: npm run prepare-directories && npm run copy-config && npm run copy-images && npm run process-html && npm run minify
scripts.minify: npm run minify-app-js && npm run minify-lib-js && npm run minify-css
scripts.minify-app-js: node node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs src/scripts/utils.js src/scripts/config.js src/scripts/utils.js src/scripts/login.js src/scripts/grant-permissions.js --mangle --compress -o dist/scripts/app.js
